#summary Describes how to use masks for Attributes

= Example Of Use =

{{{
	String telefone "Telefone"{
		x:1
		y:5
		mask: "(##) ####-####"
	}
	
	Double salario "Rendimento"{
		x:1
		y:6
		mask: "#,###.#0"
		width: 160
	}
}}}


= Wildcards =
The following wildcards are available for configure your masks:

*#* Number
*`*`* Anything

= Wildcards Examples=

== Generic ==
mask: '****'*-***'
string: namesdan
result: name's-dan

mask: (###) ###-####
string: 614-777-6094
result: (614) 777-6094

mask: (###) ###-####
string: 6147776094
result: (614) 777-6094

mask: (###) ###-####
string: 614.777.6094
result: (614) 777-6094

mask: (###) #x*-####
string: 6147a76094
result: (614) 7a7-6094

mask: ###.###.####
string: 614-777-6094
result: 614.777.6094

mask: ###/###.####
string: 614-777-6094
result: 614/777.6094

mask: phone !#: ###/###.####
string: 614-777-6094
result: phone !: 614/777.6094
